alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 11:43AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cameron and southwestern Willacy Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1142 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valley International Airport, or near Rio Hondo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Raymondville, Lyford, Rio Hondo, Texas State Technical College Harlingen, Harlingen Arts And Heritage Museum, Harlingen High School, Harlingen Soccer Complex, Willamar and Harlingen Fire Department. This includes Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 40 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
